parameters.name: LabelGroupName
parameters.description: Names a group of labels. Data in this field will be retained for service usage. Follow best practices for the security of your data.

parameters.name: FaultCodes
parameters.description: The acceptable fault codes (indicating the type of anomaly associated with the label) that can be used with this label group. Data in this field will be retained for service usage. Follow best practices for the security of your data. (string) ---

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the request to create a label group. If you do not set the client request token, Lookout for Equipment generates one. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: Tags that provide metadata about the label group you are creating. Data in this field will be retained for service usage. Follow best practices for the security of your data. (dict) --- A tag is a key-value pair that can be added to a resource as metadata. The key for the specified tag. The value for the specified tag.

nested_params.name: Key
nested_params.description: The key for the specified tag.

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: The value for the specified tag.

nested_items.name: LabelGroupName
nested_items.description: The name of the label group that you have created. Data in this field will be retained for service usage. Follow best practices for the security of your data.

nested_items.name: LabelGroupArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the label group that you have created.
